pressContact.heading: Pres Kɔntakt
pressContact.content:
Fɔ aks kwɛstyɔn bɔt prɛs, intavyu, ɛn fɔ aks fɔ di midia:
Imel: gabriela.veiga@ɔrbitaltempul.art
Wɛbsayt: ɔrbitaltemple.art

aboutProject.heading: Bɔt di Projɛkt
aboutProject.paragraph1: Orbital Temple na wan artwok ɛn sataylayt we gɛt di aim fɔ bi wan radikal inkluziv tɛmpul, we dɛn bil usay no wɔl nɔ go ebul fɔ rich. Na Brazilian atis Edson Pavoni, di atis we de biɛn di Inumeráveis Mɛmorial we rich 1 pan ɛvri 6 Brazilian dɛn di tɛm we COVID pandemik bin de, na in mek di prɔjek, ɛn i de invayt pipul dɛn frɔm ɔlsay na di wɔl fɔ sɛn di nem fɔ pɔsin we dɛn want fɔ mɛmba. Dɛn kin transmit dɛn nem ya to wan sataylayt we de ɔbit, ɛn dis kin mek wan kɔlektif mɛmorial.
aboutProject.paragraph2: Tru wan wɛbsayt we de insay 136 langwej dɛn, di wan dɛn we de tek pat kin du nyu kayn ritual. Di Ɔbital Tɛmpl de ɛksplɔrɔ di tim dɛm fɔ inklushɔn, mɛmori, ɛn wi shered mɔtalman, de aks kwɛstyɔn bɔt wetin mek no fizik tɛmpul na di Wɔl nɔ go ebul fɔ rili wɛlkɔm ɔlman, ɛn i de prɔpos spɛs as di wangren ples usay radikal inkluzivit kin de.

aboutArtist.heading: Bɔt di Atis
aboutArtist.paragraph1: Edson Pavoni na wan Brazilian atis we in joyn bigin na di strit dɛm na Sao Paulo, usay wan kɔntɛks fɔ po ɛn fɛt-fɛt bin shep in fɔs ia dɛm. Insay wan kɔntri usay Kristian rilijɔn bin de gi rod fɔ kɔmɔt na strit, drɔgs, ɛn fɛt-fɛt, Pavoni bin fɛn say fɔ ayd pan fet, we na wan tɔpik we leta, we i bi pɔsin we de kɔndɛm di bad we aw pipul dɛn de trit pipul dɛn na rilijɔn, no bɔt in atis wok.
aboutArtist.paragraph2: Insay 2020, di tɛm we COVID-19 pandemik bin de, Pavoni bin mek Inumeráveis (innumerable) , we na wan art wok we de na di intasekshɔn fɔ art ɛn jɔnalistik. Di projɛkt bin intavyu bɔku bɔku famili dɛn ɛn rayt stori dɛn bɔt di wan dɛn we lɔs bikɔs ɔf di sik, ɛn dis bin mek wan ples usay mɛmori pas nɔmba ɛn statystik. Dɛn bin de mek poem, siŋ, ɛn simfɔni wit dɛn stori dɛn de. Nyuspepa dɛn bin de mek kɔva dɛn we dɛn yuz di nem dɛn ɛn di istri dɛn. Ɔl di Brazilian sta dɛm lɛk Fɛnanda Tɔres we win Oskara, ɛn sta dɛm lɛk Sɛltɔn Mɛlo, Iva Wilma, Kamila Pitanga, Dɛbora Sɛko, Tais Araujo ɛn Lazaro Ramos, ɛn bɔku ɔda wan dɛn kin rid dɛn stori dɛn de na nashɔnal tɛlivishɔn. Di wok bin rich 32 milyɔn pipul dɛn, wan pan ɛvri 4 big pipul dɛn na Brazil. I bin bi wan nɛtwɔk fɔ mɛn pipul dɛn, we na wan kɔlektif monumɛnt fɔ mɛmba.
aboutArtist.paragraph3: Afta pas tɛn tawzin tɔk dɛn wit sɔri-at, wan patɛn bin kɔmɔt: we wi de tɔk bɔt pɔsin we dɔn day, wi kin pik sɔm pat dɛn pan dɛn stori lɛk se wi de rayt lɛta fɔ rɛkɔmɛnd to di get-kipa fɔ paradays. Wi de du wi bɛst fɔ sɛn dɛn na di say we wi biliv se na ɛvin. Dis wok bin mek wi ɔndastand nyu wan: Di tin dɛn we wi biliv bɔt udat fɔ gɛt ɛvin de shep udat wi aksept ɔ nɔ de tek pat pan na di Wɔl dairekt wan. Di Pɔtyugis pipul dɛn we bin de rul di kɔntri na Brazil bin biliv se Blak pipul dɛn nɔ gɛt ɛni sol; da biliv de bin mek i rayt fɔ bi slev. If yu na bin indijinos, if yu bɔn na di rɔng ples ɔ yu lɛk di rɔng pɔsin, dɛn stil, te tide, dɛn tɛl yu se dɛn dɔn lɔk ɛvin in domɔt fɔ yu. Yu tink se vishɔn de bɔt tumara bambay we nɔ ful-ɔp bay we dɛn nɔ gri fɔ tek am?
aboutArtist.paragraph4: Na so dɛn bɔn Ɔbital Tɛmpl.

keyFacts.heading: Di men tin dɛn we wi fɔ no bɔt
keyFacts.artist: Di pɔsin we mek di pikchɔ: Ɛdsin Pavoni (Brazil)
keyFacts.projectType: Projek Tayp: Sataylayt artwok, sayt-spɛsifi k pan spɛs, wɛb-based ritual
keyFacts.launchDate: Di De we dɛn Lanch am: Novɛmba 28, 2025
keyFacts.launchLocation: Di say we dɛn lanch: Satish Dhawan Spays Sɛnta, Sriharikota, India (ISRO)
keyFacts.participation: Patisipeshon: Fri, opin fɔ ɔlman ɔlsay na di wɔl

namesSent.heading: Nem dɛn we dɛn sɛn to Ɔbit:
namesSent.caption: Layf kɔnt ɔpdet frɔm database • Las rifresh: {deti}

mercosul.title: 13th Mɛkɔsur Biɛnal (2022) .
mercosul.location: Porto Alegre, we de na Brazil
mercosul.curator: Na Marcelo Dantas bin de kia fɔ am

lumen.title: Lumen Prayz 2022 - Fiuchɔ Awod
lumen.status: Dɛn dɔn put am na di list fɔ lɔng tɛm

cubeDesign.title: CubeDesign 2021 Kɔmpitishɔn
cubeDesign.org: Na Brazilian Instityut fɔ Spays Risach (INPE) bin promot am

team.heading: Tim
team.content: Dɛn mek Ɔbital Tɛmpl wit Sathi Roy, Pita Kaled, João Pedro Polito, Victor Baptista, João Victor Alves, André Biagioni, VK, Jonathan Querubina, Guilherme Bullejos, Eduardo Dias, Rɔbata Savian Rosa, Klara Maks, Daphne Alves, Flavio Vidigal, Andru Holzmeister, Pedro Vidigal, Tatiane Putti, Rafaɛl Fernandes, Bruna Cairo, Solid Concepts, RiseNY&Partners, IdeaSpace, ɛn ɔl di wan dɛn we kɔntinyu fɔ gi nem fɔ dis tɛmpul.

pressCoverage.heading: Featured In / Prɛs Kɔvarej
pressCoverage.paragraph1: Dɛn go ad prɛs kɔvarej ɛn ficha dɛn as dɛn de kam. Fɔ di laytst ɔpdet dɛn, duya kɔntak wi prɛs tim.
pressCoverage.paragraph2: Di ɛgzibishin ɛn ficha dɛn we dɛn bin dɔn du bifo dis tɛm na prɛzɛntɛnshɔn dɛn na di 13th Mercosul Bienal, rɛkɔgnishɔn frɔm di Lumen Prayz, ɛn sɛlɛkshɔn frɔm di Brazilian Institute of Space Research (INPE).

images.heading: Pikchɔ dɛn we gɛt Ay Rizolushɔn fɔ Yuz fɔ Prɛs
images.intro: Ɔl di pikchɔ dɛn de fɔ ɛditorial yuz. Klik ɛni pikchɔ fɔ dawnlod di fayl we gɛt ay rɛsɔlɔshɔn.
